author: rdonkin
msg: Applied patch for enhancement #17811. This refactors the common code in ResultSetDynaClass and RowSetDynaClass into a common superclass. Submitted by George Franciscus

author: rdonkin
msg: This patch contain numerous improvements to locale convert utils. These include more graceful handling of nulls and more precise numeric classes returned from numeric convertions. Submitted by Michael Szlapa.

author: rdonkin
msg: Improved exception reporting. IllegalArgumentExceptions thrown by method invocation are now caught and rethrown with more information. Suggested by Tim Sawyer.

author: rdonkin
msg: Fix for document typo. Submitted by Reza Shahbazi

author: rdonkin
msg: First stage of moving functionality out of static utility methods and into beans. This is a simple replacement with singletons and protected factory methods. I wanted to get the main reorganization into CVS as soon as possible. Addition factory methods and other improvements will arrive a little later. Class and instance methods cannot have the same name so new classes were required.
